features.name: Auth pages exist
features.notes: Completed. Auth pages functional with Clerk.

features.name: Redirect to dashboard after auth
features.notes: Redirects via Clerk fallbackRedirectUrl props in SignIn/SignUp. Route protection via proxy.ts (Next.js 16 convention) using clerkMiddleware + auth.protect(). Demo mode passthrough when Clerk not configured.

features.name: Browse properties at /properties
acceptance: Properties fetched from Convex (not mock data)
Filtering by city works with real data
features.notes: Wired to Convex listProperties and searchProperties queries. City filter uses index. Property type filter client-side for 'apartment' category (includes 1br-4br). Search triggers at 2+ chars. Loading skeletons added.

features.name: View property detail at /properties/[id]
features.notes: Wired to Convex getProperty query. Updated query to resolve image URLs from storage. Loading skeleton and not-found states added. Landlord info, amenities, and contact button all functional.

features.name: Landlord can create property
acceptance: Landlord redirected to property list after creation
features.notes: Completed. Form wired to createProperty, generateUploadUrl, addPropertyImages mutations. Images uploaded sequentially. Dashboard list uses getMyProperties query.

features.name: User can message landlord
acceptance: Message button on property detail sends message
features.notes: Completed. Contact dialog on property detail sends via sendMessage mutation. Messages list wired to getConversations. Conversation view wired to getMessages + sendMessage + markMessagesAsRead. Real-time updates automatic via Convex useQuery.
